Texts.Chs: 使用双手近战武器时，其基础攻击力增加至120%：且随智力增长。
Texts.Eng: 120% Base Power with Two-Handed Melee Weapons: Scales with Int.

Texts.Chs: 次要攻击: 向至日充能，增加其威力，并使其在每次挥动中造成新星伤害。充能时再按一次，以释放具有破坏性的爆炸能量。
Texts.Eng: Alt Fire: charge Solstice, increasing its potency and causing it to deal Nova Damage with every swing. Press again while charged to discharge the energy with a damaging explosion.

Texts.Chs: 可以使用双手近战武器。
Texts.Eng: Can use Two Handed Melee Weapons.

Texts.Chs: 存在多个敌人时，攻击倍乘+200%，但在附近没有敌人时-50%。
Texts.Eng: Power Multiplier increases up to +200% when multiple enemies are present, but decreases by -50% when there are none nearby.

Texts.Chs:
按[Special 1]或者[Shift] + [Special 1]在不同的光环之间循环切换。
^red;腥红光环: 115%攻击倍乘; 75%最大生命。伤害敌人时恢复生命。
^gray;钢铁光环: 115% 最大生命; 75%速度和跳跃高度。
伤害敌人时获得临时的护甲。
^green;离子光环: 115%速度和跳跃高度; 75%攻击倍乘。
伤害敌人时回复能量。
Texts.Eng:
Press [Special 1] or [Shift] + [Special 1] to cycle between auras. 
^red;Blood Aura: 115% Power Multiplier; 75% Max Health. Damaging foes regens Health.
^gray;Iron Aura: 115% Max Health; 75% Speed and Jump Height.
Damaging foes grants temporary Armor.
^green;Ionic Aura: 115% Speed and Jump Height; 75% Power Multiplier.
Damaging foes regens Energy.

Texts.Chs: 主要攻击：横扫连击穿插着快速刺击。
Texts.Eng: Primary Fire: a wide sweeping combo interspersed with quick stabs.
